headline: Exxon Mobil Vs. Chevron: One Oil Giant Stands Above The Other
summary: Exxon (XOM) vs Chevron (CVX): see why XOM offers higher long-term upside, stronger cash-flow growth, and better capital discipline.

headline: NCLA Asks First Circuit to Reel in Rule Requiring Fishermen to Pay for Gov’t Monitors on Their Boats
summary: Relentless Inc., et al. v. U.S. Dept. of Commerce, et al.Washington, DC, Jan. 16, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The New Civil Liberties Alliance filed its opening brief today at the U.S. Court of Appeals for the First Circuit in Relentless, Inc. v. Dept. of Commerce. headline: 3 Dividend Stocks to Hold for the Next 20 Years
